alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 3:21PM MST until August 27 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 400 PM MST. * At 321 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sun Lakes, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Sun Lakes, Queen Creek, Chandler Heights, Tumbleweed Park, Chandler City Hall, San Tan Village Mall, Seville, Bapchule, Chandler Fashion Center Mall, Phoenix Mesa Gateway Airport, San Tan Mountain Park and Firebird Lake. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 162 and 177. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 148 and 166. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 34 and 54. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
